subject: Colleges and Universities
Stadiums and Arenas
College Athletics
Prisons and Prisoners
Football (College)
Names, Organizational
lead_paragraph: Florida Atlantic University will name its football building GEO Group Stadium, after the prisons corporation, leading critics to wonder just how far colleges and teams will go for revenue.
snippet: Florida Atlantic University will name its football building GEO Group Stadium, after the prisons corporation, leading critics to wonder just how far colleges and teams will go for revenue.
